about_the_game:
This music set is for those who liked "I LIVE UNDER YOUR HOUSE" and want to support the developer.
The album contains 11 mp3s lasting about 30 minutes.
I've included my very first pieces of music here as a bonus, as well as a couple of tracks from the upcoming dlc.
I think you will be interested to listen to them because they are more complex compositions than the minimalistic ambient used in this game.
Thanks to everyone who leaves feedback, writes reviews and of course to all those who bought my game!
Thank you!
